metadata.title: Digital Heirloom - Secure Your Digital Legacy
metadata.description: Protect and securely transfer your digital assets, encrypted wealth, and precious memories to your loved ones. Zero-knowledge encryption, automated heartbeat detection, and physical key fragmentation for ultimate security.
metadata.keywords: digital legacy, digital inheritance, encrypted assets, zero-knowledge encryption, dead man switch, digital vault, crypto inheritance, digital estate planning, secure data transfer
